/ . / node_modules / grunt / node_modules / grunt-legacy-util / test / fixtures / spawn-multibyte.js
    #

    This is a test fixture for a case where spawn receives incomplete multibyte strings in separate data events.

    #

    A multibyte buffer containing all our output. We will slice it later. In this case we are using a Japanese word for hello / good day, where each character takes three bytes.

    var fullOutput = new Buffer('こんにちは');
    #

    Output one full character and one third of a character

    process.stdout.write(fullOutput.slice(0, 4));
    #

    Output the rest of the string

    process.stdout.write(fullOutput.slice(4));
    #

    Do the same for stderr

    process.stderr.write(fullOutput.slice(0, 4));
process.stderr.write(fullOutput.slice(4));
